name: Deepak Shah
about:
Leadership roles in planning, implementation and control of launch and revival of ad agencies and brands. Efforts resulted in significant improvements in Brand Awareness, Market Share and Business Turnaround campaigns.

Launch and revival record includes but not restricted to brands from leading local and international organizations like: AMUL, Godrej Soaps, Raymond, Hindustan Lever, ITC and VST Cigarettes, Herbertsons, McDowell's, Everest Spices, Tata Tea, Mahindra, ANZ Grindlay's Bank, Deutsche Bank, Phillips, ICI Dulux Paints, Zodiac Menswear amongst many others. These projects provided understanding of diverse products, markets, customers and competition.

Turned around numerous ad agencies in India and Sri Lanka.

Launched North India's premier real estate developer brand IREO as Chief Marketing Officer. A subsidiary of a US based $. 2 Billion PE Fund, IREO has invested in more than 3000+ acres of prime land in Gurgaon and Punjab to develop upmarket residential, commercial and mixed-use projects.

As Sr VP Marketing and Sales, at Prestige Estates Bangalore led a multi-location team based in various locations in South India. Prestige is a listed company and has delivered over 200 million square feet of residential, commercial and mixed-use developments.

Invited as Guest lecturer in advertising and brand strategy at leading management schools in India and Sri Lanka.

Since 2014, independent consultant in Marketing Communication and Brand management subjects.

name: Natali Tshuva
about:
As the co-founder of Sternum, Iâve been fortunate to lead a groundbreaking journey in IoT and device security. Together with an exceptional team, we built patented technology from the ground up to tackle some of the toughest challenges in this space, including runtime memory protection, control flow integrity, and anomaly detection.

Before founding Sternum, I served in Israel's elite Unit 8200 and gained extensive experience as a vulnerability researcher and team leader across multiple companies. During this time, I developed a deep technical foundation in cybersecurity, specializing in zero-day vulnerability discovery and exploitation of complex systems. This expertise shaped Sternumâs approach to securing IoT devices at scale.

Our work has enabled us to partner with industry leaders in the medical and defense sectors, working alongside innovators in various industries to transform medical device security and safeguard critical military assets. Raising over $35M in funding and reaching multi-million-dollar ARR were milestones, but what I value most are the relationships we built with our team and customers along the way.

Invented and patented unique algorithms that provide runtime protection and anomaly detection, with features like memory protection, control flow integrity and command injection prevention.â¢ Raised over $35M in funding from top venture capital firms; Drove strategic partnerships with industry leaders like Medtronic, securing early adopters and validating our technology with enterprise clients.â¢ Managed global team operations spanning the U.S., Europe, and Israel, aligning product vision with customer needs to achieve multi-million-dollar ARR.â¢ Organized workshops and conferences, providing expert insights on cybersecurity, memory vulnerabilities, and IoT exploitation to global audiences.

projects.title: Data Harmonisation Project
projects.description: As a consequence of Business acquisitions and mergers the data and reporting infrastructure took a severe hit. Critical data was being hosted in different legacy systems and the project was initiated to address the business need to be able to see a harmonized view of data from multiple data sources managed by varying processes. The effort involved, understanding the data sources and its intricacies, addressing challenges to harmonize data, bringing them under one roof, which in this case was a SQL Server Database and then building a full fledged reporting environment and Analytical solutions using Microsoft Power BI. This dashboard solution was hosted on a Sharepoint with user specific access privileges being managed from both MS Power BI Service and MS Sharepoint.

name: Laljibhai Patel
about:
My years at Erdem, I felt like the magician of every woman's dream wardrobe. Each piece blended traditional elegance with modern innovation, like classic and avant-garde in one. If I could make you feel like a superstar when you wore them, then I'd achieved my goal. The details? Of course, I was obsessed with every detail, because true beauty lies in making every woman feel her own unique brilliance.

During my time at DVF, I was completely enchanted by the world of design. Diane von Furstenberg is known for her bold colors and sexy style, and I was excited to bring fresh blood to this legendary brand. From the iconic wrap dress to those instantly charming prints, each design is infused with a deep understanding of femininity. After the relaunch of DVF, our goal is to make every wearer feel confident and elegant. This experience has not only made me a more mature designer, but also given me a deeper understanding of fashion - and this is how I like to live a stylish and humorous life.

experience.title: Design Director
experience.description: I am a design director at Brooks Running. I lead the team to find a balance between creativity and strategy, and I am committed to turning innovative ideas into influential designs in the market. I have extensive design experience and deep industry knowledge, and I am good at controlling brand vision and design direction from a macro perspective. Under my leadership, we not only focus on the aesthetics of design, but also on functionality and user experience. My goal is to drive brand growth and development by leading the team's creative process while maintaining high standards and market competitiveness in design.
experience.description_html: I am a design director at Brooks Running. I lead the team to find a balance between creativity and strategy, and I am committed to turning innovative ideas into influential designs in the market. I have extensive design experience and deep industry knowledge, and I am good at controlling brand vision and design direction from a macro perspective. Under my leadership, we not only focus on the aesthetics of design, but also on functionality and user experience. My goal is to drive brand growth and development by leading the team's creative process while maintaining high standards and market competitiveness in design.

experience.title: Senior Designer
experience.description: Diane von Furstenberg is a global luxury fashion brand known for its bold and creative colors and prints, and admired for its sensual femininity. I founded DVF in 1972, and by 1976, more than 5 million dresses had been sold. After a brief hiatus, I relaunched DVF in 2008. Known for its signature wrap dresses and iconic prints, DVF now offers a full collection of ready-to-wear and accessories, and has become a creative leader in the fashion industry.

positions.title: Virtual & Fractional CFO Services
positions.description_html:
Customized Scope | Adaptable to all Time Zones | Remote Work Capability | Global experience with companies operating across APAC, ME, EU, and the USA | In-depth knowledge of IFRS, US GAAP, TP, DTAA, and global financial regulations | Expertise in multiple financial software, ERP systems, and data analytics tools

Bringing over 15 years of CFO experience, I offer virtual and fractional CFO services tailored for SMEs. I address critical financial challenges and provide strategic solutions to facilitate growth opportunities through sound financial strategies, strengthen financial stability and resilience, optimize financial processes and resources, and empower leadership with actionable financial insights.

Offered Solutions:
â¢ Financial Strategy: Creating and implementing strategic financial plans aligned with business goals.
â¢ Strategic Decision Support: Offering data-driven insights for informed decision-making.
â¢ Financial Planning & Analysis: Analyzing and forecasting financial performance to guide decision-making.
â¢ Budgeting & Forecasting: Creating budgets and forecasts to align financial goals.
â¢ Cash Flow Management: Monitoring cash flow, optimizing working capital, and managing liquidity.
â¢ Financial Reporting: Producing timely and accurate financial reports for stakeholders.
â¢ Cost Management: Identifying cost-saving opportunities and optimizing expenditures.
â¢ Risk Management: Assessing financial risks and implementing strategies to mitigate them.
â¢ Capital Structure and Financing: Advising on optimal capital structure and securing financing.
â¢ M&A Support: Providing financial due diligence and integration support during M&A activities.
â¢ Investment Advisory: Evaluating investment opportunities and providing insights, and recommendations.
â¢ Compliance Oversight: Ensuring compliance with financial regulations and reporting requirements.
â¢ Investor Relations: Facilitating communication with investors regarding financial performance and strategy.

positions.title: Tax Advisory Services (Domestic & International Tax)
positions.description_html:
Offering tax advisory services for individuals and SMEs, addressing their unique challenges with tailored solutions to optimize tax efficiency, minimize liabilities, improve cash flow management, profitability through strategic tax planning, and ensure compliance with tax regulations, effectively mitigating risks.

Areas Covered: Income Tax, Capital Gains Tax, M&A Tax, Transfer Pricing, Cross-Border Transactions, Withholding Tax, GST

Offered Solutions:
â¢ Tax Planning: Developing strategies to minimize tax liabilities and optimize financial outcomes.
â¢ Tax Opinion: Access to expert tax research and opinion on complex tax matters.
â¢ Tax Compliance Management: Ensuring adherence to local and international tax laws and regulations.
â¢ Tax Optimization: Structuring transactions and operations to maximize tax efficiency.
â¢ Corporate Taxation: Advising on corporate tax implications and obligations.
â¢ Individual Taxation: Providing guidance on personal income tax matters for stakeholders.
â¢ International Taxation: Managing tax implications for businesses operating across borders.

positions.title: Financial Process, Policies, SOPs & Financial Control
positions.description_html:
I offer specialized services focused on the design and development of business processes, policies, Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), Delegation of Authority (DOA), and financial controls for Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs).

Offered Solutions:

Process Design and Optimization:
â¢ Assessment and Mapping: Evaluating current processes and identifying areas for improvement.
â¢ Redesigning Workflows: Developing streamlined workflows to enhance operational efficiency.
â¢ Automation: Identifying opportunities for process automation to reduce manual tasks and errors.

Policies and SOP Development:
â¢ Policy Creation: Formulating comprehensive policies tailored to business needs.
â¢ SOP: Developing clear and detailed SOPs to ensure consistency and compliance in daily operations.
â¢ Training: Providing training on new policies and procedures, including integration into the business.

Delegation of Authority (DOA):
â¢ DOA Development: Establishing clear roles and responsibilities to streamline decision-making processes.
â¢ Authorization Limits: Defining financial and operational authorization limits to enhance control.
â¢ Communication and Training: Educating staff on DOA structures to ensure effective implementation.

Financial Control Systems:
â¢ Internal Control Assessment: Reviewing existing financial controls to identify weaknesses.
â¢ Control Framework: Designing robust financial controls to mitigate risks and ensure accurate financial reporting.
â¢ Fraud Prevention: Implementing safeguards to detect and prevent fraud and financial mismanagement.

Scalability Support:
â¢ Growth-Oriented Processes: Designing processes and controls that support business expansion.
â¢ Continuous Improvement: Providing ongoing support to adapt processes and controls as the business evolves.

positions.subtitle: DPR CONSULTANTS
positions.description: With over two decades of experience in planning and implementing various ERP & BI systems, I offer specialized ERP functional consultant services. These are dedicated to resolving critical business challenges and implementing tailored solutions to optimize operational efficiency and drive growth. This includes streamlining workflows to enhance productivity, providing access to real-time, accurate data for informed decision-making, ensuring compliance with regulatory and industry-specific requirements, and supporting scalable business growth with adaptable ERP solutions.Offered Solutions:â¢	ERP Implementation: Planning, deploying, and configuring ERP systems to streamline operations.â¢	Business Process Analysis: Assessing current workflows and recommending improvements (ERP capabilities).â¢	Data Integration: Integrating disparate systems to ensure seamless data flow.â¢	Data Migration: Ensuring smooth transfer of data from legacy systems to the new ERP platform.â¢	Customization/Configuration: Tailoring ERP modules/functionalities to suit specific business requirements.â¢	Training and Change Management: Educating end-users on ERP usage and managing organizational transition.â¢	Reporting and Analytics: Designing and implementing BI solutions for real-time reporting and data analysis.â¢	Integration Services: Connecting ERP systems with other business applications for seamless data flow.â¢	Compliance Management: Ensuring ERP systems align with regulatory and industry standards.â¢	Support and Maintenance: Providing ongoing support to ensure ERP system stability and performance.â¢	ERP Upgrade/Enhancement: Upgrading ERP systems/enhancing features to align with evolving business needs.â¢	Cloud ERP Solutions: Implementing and managing cloud-based ERP solutions for scalability and accessibility.
positions.title: ERP Functional Consultant Services
positions.description_html:
With over two decades of experience in planning and implementing various ERP & BI systems, I offer specialized ERP functional consultant services. These are dedicated to resolving critical business challenges and implementing tailored solutions to optimize operational efficiency and drive growth. This includes streamlining workflows to enhance productivity, providing access to real-time, accurate data for informed decision-making, ensuring compliance with regulatory and industry-specific requirements, and supporting scalable business growth with adaptable ERP solutions.

Offered Solutions:
â¢ ERP Implementation: Planning, deploying, and configuring ERP systems to streamline operations.
â¢ Business Process Analysis: Assessing current workflows and recommending improvements (ERP capabilities).
â¢ Data Integration: Integrating disparate systems to ensure seamless data flow.
â¢ Data Migration: Ensuring smooth transfer of data from legacy systems to the new ERP platform.
â¢ Customization/Configuration: Tailoring ERP modules/functionalities to suit specific business requirements.
â¢ Training and Change Management: Educating end-users on ERP usage and managing organizational transition.
â¢ Reporting and Analytics: Designing and implementing BI solutions for real-time reporting and data analysis.
â¢ Integration Services: Connecting ERP systems with other business applications for seamless data flow.
â¢ Compliance Management: Ensuring ERP systems align with regulatory and industry standards.
â¢ Support and Maintenance: Providing ongoing support to ensure ERP system stability and performance.
â¢ ERP Upgrade/Enhancement: Upgrading ERP systems/enhancing features to align with evolving business needs.
â¢ Cloud ERP Solutions: Implementing and managing cloud-based ERP solutions for scalability and accessibility.

One of my strengths lies in my ability to visit factory sites and understand diverse manufacturing processes, performing checks for compliance with all statutory regulations. These experiences have allowed me to develop a keen eye for detail and a deep understanding of various industries, which has proved invaluable in my work.

I am Gautam G. Nadkarni, having more than 33 years of diversified experience. My expertise includes Project Information Management, 3D Engineering System and Database Management. I am highly articulate, focused and dedicated person updated with latest trends and techniques in the field. My ability to analyze needs and create unique designs to yield a profitable outcome has proven to be one of my greatest assets.

I have a huge experience in swiftly ramping-up projects with competent cross-functional skills. I am responsible for implementation and coordinating project activities. I coordinate with the development department for design solutions with customer in order to ensure they meet functional requirements within cost and schedule constrains. I congregate product specifications and upgrade existing systems. I am responsible for checking quality assurance plans.

During my career I have gained enormous experience from different companies like Bentley Systems India Pvt. Ltd, Jacobs H&G Pvt. Ltd, Foster Wheeler Eastern Pvt. Ltd, Jacobs H&G Pvt. Ltd, Rolta India Limited, Murudeshwar Ceramics Ltd, Naveen Structurals & Engineering Co. Pvt. Ltd, Air-India, Toyo Engineering India Ltd as Assistant Manager in 3D Administration department where I was responsible for implementing Smart Plant 3D, Fluor Daniel and currently associated with L&T Hydrocarbon Engineering Offshore division.

As a leader I am highly motivated and performance driven individual who enjoys managing team, and delivering results with strategic action plans reflecting high deliverables and profits. I possess excellent interpersonal, communication, organizational skills, with proven abilities of leading motivated teams towards achieving organizational goals.

I have earned PG Diploma in Piping Design & Engineering from MIT and Diploma in Mechanical Engineering from K.H.Kabbur Institute of Engineering. I am well versed in CAD applications, Windows 95, 98, NT, 2000, and XP.

To know more, Reach me at gautamnk@gmail.com and we can discuss the opportunities further

name: Vijay Agarwal
about:
With over 3 decades of experience as a seasoned Infrastructure Investment leader, I have played a pivotal role in shaping the industry.

My expertise in identifying and assessing investment opportunities has helped drive successful investment and capital projects across various sectors, including transportation, energy, and urban infrastructure. I have successfully invested, operated, and monetized various infrastructure businesses through private equity, strategic sale, InVIT, or IPO.

I have demonstrated strong business leadership and management skills throughout my infrastructure development career, leveraging my expertise to deliver profitable results for my clients and organizations. My exceptional partnership and networking skills have enabled me to cultivate strong relationships with industry players and key decision-makers, driving collaborative efforts to achieve shared goals.

I have led successful infrastructure projects from concept to completion, delivering outstanding results that have transformed communities and created sustainable economic growth â Mumbai Nashik Expressway, Zurich Airport, and Jaipur Kishangarh Expressway, to name a few. With a passion for innovation and a relentless drive for excellence, I am committed to advancing the industry.

I have actively participated in various infrastructure and finance committees as an industry leader. I have participated in conferences and seminars representing the infrastructure industry, including CII, FICCI, BFI, GRI, etc.

In the first phase of Covid 19, the alums of the 1992-94 batch of Sydenham Institute of Management Studies, Research and Entrepreneurship Education (SIMSREE) came together with a vision to give back to our society. We set up Simarthan Foundation, a not-for-profit company of which I am the Chairman. I have also set up healthcare centers and educational institutions to improve and supplement education for students from various backgrounds.

I believe achieving success professionally and personally is possible when prioritizing self-care and well-being. So, with years of experience navigating the demands of a high-pressure work environment, I ensure to spend quality time with family, reading, traveling, and driving. Developing a schedule with dedicated time for personal pursuits helps me maintain a healthy work-life balance.

experience.title: Network Engineer
experience.description: â¢	Conduct in-depth analysis of US Telco circuit impairments by assessing complex data output from multiple support systems and responsible for customer interface & overall impairment resolution.â¢	Checking, Isolating and troubleshooting Layer 1 issues and Layer 3 issues.â¢	Configuring, troubleshooting, optimizing Customer premise Equipment.â¢	Testing latency issues by pulling out CRC errors, load, usage report, protocol impairment and input & output errors on the interfaces and to validate WIC if errors are detected. â¢	Testing layer 2 issues on both data and voice T1 circuits by using the tools like looking-glass, by running different ping patterns. â¢	Executing L-Test by selecting series of patterns and each patterns executed for selected time. The sequence is used to quickly verify the probability of the circuit passing a full conformance test and concluding the result a Pass/Fail.â¢	Working on Escalation tickets up to level 4, taking ownership and directing the ticket in right direction and solving the issue by diagnostic tests & possible alternative configurations based on degree of service.â¢	Performing Hard-loop test using OOB number to isolate in which section of the circuit the trouble exists. This type of testing is essential if the customer has an extended demarc, which is more often the trouble exists.â¢	Validating Customer End routers by remote login using in-band/out of band number and closely working with Global Tier 3 support team in migrating customer issues.â¢	Working on Layer 3 protocols likeEIGRP,OSPF and BGP.â¢	Coordinating with Central office and Local Access provider for Head to Head testing to determine and isolating faults in the circuit.
experience.description_html:
â¢ Conduct in-depth analysis of US Telco circuit impairments by assessing complex data output from multiple support systems and responsible for customer interface & overall impairment resolution.
â¢ Checking, Isolating and troubleshooting Layer 1 issues and Layer 3 issues.
â¢ Configuring, troubleshooting, optimizing Customer premise Equipment.
â¢ Testing latency issues by pulling out CRC errors, load, usage report, protocol impairment and input & output errors on the interfaces and to validate WIC if errors are detected.
â¢ Testing layer 2 issues on both data and voice T1 circuits by using the tools like looking-glass, by running different ping patterns.
â¢ Executing L-Test by selecting series of patterns and each patterns executed for selected time. The sequence is used to quickly verify the probability of the circuit passing a full conformance test and concluding the result a Pass/Fail.
â¢ Working on Escalation tickets up to level 4, taking ownership and directing the ticket in right direction and solving the issue by diagnostic tests & possible alternative configurations based on degree of service.
â¢ Performing Hard-loop test using OOB number to isolate in which section of the circuit the trouble exists. This type of testing is essential if the customer has an extended demarc, which is more often the trouble exists.
â¢ Validating Customer End routers by remote login using in-band/out of band number and closely working with Global Tier 3 support team in migrating customer issues.
â¢ Working on Layer 3 protocols likeEIGRP,OSPF and BGP.
â¢ Coordinating with Central office and Local Access provider for Head to Head testing to determine and isolating faults in the circuit.

experience.description: "Solarium is revolutionizing India's renewable energy landscape by offering a comprehensive range of products and services across the solar energy spectrum. We leverage cutting-edge technology to make sustainable energy accessible to everyone, paving the way for a cleaner, greener future and building a zero-carbon world.We pride ourselves on delivering reliable solutions that meet the unique needs of our customers. By adopting best practices and implementing stringent quality controls, we ensure high-quality sourcing and deliver best-in-class products and solutions.Solarium empowers over 9,000 homes per year to generate their own electricity and has successfully solarized more than 18,000 Indian homes to date. We have commissioned over 125 MW of projects, including 65 MW of residential projects, 35 MW of rooftop projects, and 25 MW of ground-mounted projects, with a presence in more than 60 cities.Bootstrapped and profitable since inception, Solarium is led by an experienced management team with deep domain knowledge and cross-functional expertise. Our team comprises over 180 members and 250+ hub-level entrepreneurs, all with a solid understanding of the renewable energy sector. Driven by a shared passion for building a sustainable future for our country, the collective experience and dedication of our team and community of hub-level entrepreneurs have been key to our success.We are a dedicated team leveraging cutting-edge technology to create a societal and environmental impact. Solarium is not just a solar company; we are a powerful force driving a more sustainable and zero-carbonÂ world."
experience.description_html:
"Solarium is revolutionizing India's renewable energy landscape by offering a comprehensive range of products and services across the solar energy spectrum. We leverage cutting-edge technology to make sustainable energy accessible to everyone, paving the way for a cleaner, greener future and building a zero-carbon world.

We pride ourselves on delivering reliable solutions that meet the unique needs of our customers. By adopting best practices and implementing stringent quality controls, we ensure high-quality sourcing and deliver best-in-class products and solutions.

Solarium empowers over 9,000 homes per year to generate their own electricity and has successfully solarized more than 18,000 Indian homes to date. We have commissioned over 125 MW of projects, including 65 MW of residential projects, 35 MW of rooftop projects, and 25 MW of ground-mounted projects, with a presence in more than 60 cities.

Bootstrapped and profitable since inception, Solarium is led by an experienced management team with deep domain knowledge and cross-functional expertise. Our team comprises over 180 members and 250+ hub-level entrepreneurs, all with a solid understanding of the renewable energy sector. Driven by a shared passion for building a sustainable future for our country, the collective experience and dedication of our team and community of hub-level entrepreneurs have been key to our success.

We are a dedicated team leveraging cutting-edge technology to create a societal and environmental impact. Solarium is not just a solar company; we are a powerful force driving a more sustainable and zero-carbon world."

name: Neeraj Agrawal
about:
Result-oriented and Decisive Business Leader with over 27 years of experience in telecommunications industry. Management degree from a Premier B-school and a Passion for Technology, Innovation and Excellence.

Successfully delivered Overall annual operating plan of the retail broadband business in India as Broadband Business Head at GTPL Hathway, a leading cable TV and wired broadband service provider.

Shown exponential growth and turnaround of the business in the last Six years, beating all the growth trends of the wired broadband industry despite fierce competition from Jio and Airtel. Managed multiple channels of sales and marketing operations, product and pricing strategy, customer acquisition and retention, network and brand strategy, and P&L management. I have also specialized in handling all telecom portfolios, especially fiber to home technology (FTTx) and 4G.

Believed in people as the real asset and led a team of over 2000 people across diverse roles and geographies. I am a quick learner, a digital evangelist, and a person with deep integrity and honesty.

experience.description_html:
Key Responsibilities:

Talent Acquisition & Management :-

Management of complete recruitment life cycle for identifying best talent
from diverse sources from entry level to middle management level.
Organizing walk-in and mass interviews.
Conducting telephonic Interviews and short-listing potential candidates.
Coordinating personal interviews with managers & departmental heads.
Conducting Recruitment Drives, Campuses etc for closing Sales & Non Sales positions.
Closing positions within given TAT.
Reference check of new joinees.
Ensure that the offer letter gets mailed to the candidates before joining, & follow up with candidate for joining post offer

Joining Formalities :-

Making new entries for new entrants.
Ensure that the Appointment Letter is been handed over to the candidates on time.
Processing bank account formalities.
Sending Introduction mail to all employees about new joining.
On boarding & Induction of new joinees.

Employee Relationship Development :-

Monthly Birthday Celebrations.
Arrangement of get-together/ fun games for the employees.
Organizing internal as well as external events.



MIS and Database Management :-

Preparing MIS i.e. Manpower Requisition Details, Open Positions, Status
Maintaining reports such as interview status, Closed Positions and positions in Pipeline etc.
Preparation of Weekly and Monthly recruitment reports.
Maintaining proper database, to ensure 100% accuracy

name: Tejal Nahata
about:
Passionate about crafting memorable experiences, I have journeyed through various roles in marketing, business development, content writing, retail, and home baking. Currently I'm exploring Event industry. My diverse background equips me with a unique perspective, allowing me to infuse creativity and innovation into every project I undertake.

With a solid foundation in management and marketing, I approach each task with commitment and a drive to excel. I believe in continuous learning and growth, leveraging every opportunity to enhance my skills and deliver outstanding results.

Beyond my professional endeavors, I am a numismatist and during my leisure time I love to write prose, poetry, haiku, and quotes. Cooking and music serve as my therapy, fueling my creativity and keeping me grounded.

Let's connect and explore how we can create something extraordinary together!

experience.title: Client Servicing Executive

This position required a keen eye for detail, superior organizational skills, and the ability to foster strong relationships with discerning clients who expect nothing short of excellence.* Key Responsibilities1.  Client Relationship Management:   - Primary & Secondary contact for premium clients, ensuring high standards of service.   - Built strong, trusting relationships through regular communication and personalized service.2. Event Planning and Coordination:   - Understood client vision and requirements for personalized events.   - Created detailed event plans covering venue, decor and entertainment - Ensured seamless, memorable experiences aligned with client preferences.3. Attention to Detail:   - Focused on perfecting every event detail, from floral arrangements to color schemes.   - Conducted thorough site inspections and pre-event checks.4. Vendor and Stakeholder Coordination:- Liaised with high-end vendors and service providers, negotiating contracts.   - Coordinated with internal teams to ensure smooth execution and adherence to budgets and timelines.5. Budget Management:   - Managed budgets effectively, balancing cost-efficiency and quality.   - Provided detailed budget reports to clients for transparency.6. Feedback and Continuous Improvement:   - Gathered and implemented client feedback to enhance future events.Skills and Competencies:-- Detail-Oriented: Ensured perfection in every event aspect.- Communication: Strong skills in building rapport and managing expectations.- Organizational Skills: Managed multiple events and tasks simultaneously.- Problem-Solving: Proactive in addressing and resolving issues.- Negotiation: Secured best quality and prices with high-end vendors.
experience.description_html:
As a Client Servicing Executive in the Curated Parties division, my role was to deliver exceptional service and meticulously manage every detail of high-end, personalized events for our premium clientele. This position required a keen eye for detail, superior organizational skills, and the ability to foster strong relationships with discerning clients who expect nothing short of excellence.

* Key Responsibilities

1. Client Relationship Management:

- Primary & Secondary contact for premium clients, ensuring high standards of service.

- Built strong, trusting relationships through regular communication and personalized service.

2. Event Planning and Coordination:

- Understood client vision and requirements for personalized events.

- Created detailed event plans covering venue, decor and entertainment

- Ensured seamless, memorable experiences aligned with client preferences.

3. Attention to Detail:

- Focused on perfecting every event detail, from floral arrangements to color schemes.

- Conducted thorough site inspections and pre-event checks.

4. Vendor and Stakeholder Coordination:

- Liaised with high-end vendors and service providers, negotiating contracts.

- Coordinated with internal teams to ensure smooth execution and adherence to budgets and timelines.

5. Budget Management:

- Managed budgets effectively, balancing cost-efficiency and quality.

- Provided detailed budget reports to clients for transparency.

6. Feedback and Continuous Improvement:

- Gathered and implemented client feedback to enhance future events.

Skills and Competencies:-

- Detail-Oriented: Ensured perfection in every event aspect.

- Communication: Strong skills in building rapport and managing expectations.

- Organizational Skills: Managed multiple events and tasks simultaneously.

- Problem-Solving: Proactive in addressing and resolving issues.

- Negotiation: Secured best quality and prices with high-end vendors.

experience.title: Retail Store Manager
experience.description: As the Retail Store Manager of my own stationery shop, I was responsible for overseeing all aspects of the business. This role involved managing daily operations, ensuring customer satisfaction, handling inventory, and driving sales. My entrepreneurial spirit and hands-on approach helped establish and grow a successful retail store.Key Responsibilities1. Store Management:   - Oversaw daily store operations, ensuring a smooth and efficient workflow.  - Implemented policies and procedures to maintain high standards of service and cleanliness.2. Customer Service:   - Provided excellent customer service, assisting customers with product selections and inquiries.   - Handled customer complaints and returns, ensuring a positive shopping experience.3. Inventory Management:   - Managed inventory levels, conducted regular stock checks, and reordered products as needed.   - Organized and displayed products to maximize sales and maintain an appealing store layout.4. Sales and Marketing:   - Developed and executed sales strategies to attract customers and boost revenue.   - Promoted the store through local advertising, social media, and special events.5. Financial Management:   - Handled all financial aspects of the business, including budgeting, accounting, and cash flow management.   - Analyzed sales data to make informed business decisions and identify growth opportunities.6. Vendor Relations:   - Negotiated with suppliers to secure the best prices and terms for products.   - Maintained strong relationships with vendors to ensure timely delivery and quality of goods.7. experience.description_html:
As the Retail Store Manager of my own stationery shop, I was responsible for overseeing all aspects of the business. This role involved managing daily operations, ensuring customer satisfaction, handling inventory, and driving sales. My entrepreneurial spirit and hands-on approach helped establish and grow a successful retail store.

Key Responsibilities

1. Store Management:

- Oversaw daily store operations, ensuring a smooth and efficient workflow.

- Implemented policies and procedures to maintain high standards of service and cleanliness.

2. Customer Service:

- Provided excellent customer service, assisting customers with product selections and inquiries.

- Handled customer complaints and returns, ensuring a positive shopping experience.

3. Inventory Management:

- Managed inventory levels, conducted regular stock checks, and reordered products as needed.

- Organized and displayed products to maximize sales and maintain an appealing store layout.

4. Sales and Marketing:

- Developed and executed sales strategies to attract customers and boost revenue.

- Promoted the store through local advertising, social media, and special events.

5. Financial Management:

- Handled all financial aspects of the business, including budgeting, accounting, and cash flow management.

- Analyzed sales data to make informed business decisions and identify growth opportunities.

6. Vendor Relations:

- Negotiated with suppliers to secure the best prices and terms for products.

- Maintained strong relationships with vendors to ensure timely delivery and quality of goods.

7. Store Maintenance:

- Ensured the store was clean, organized, and well-maintained.

- Addressed any maintenance issues promptly to provide a safe and pleasant shopping environment.

experience.description: Moving from audit background to an industy has been a different journey and a very different experience.  Core Areas of work responsibility at Integreon included:-	Managing the accurate monthly closure of financial reports of all legal entities including 3 processes (AP, PO and General Ledger) & team of 20 members and ensuring that MIS is prepared and reported to the management by the cut-off date.  -	Handling the entire month end activities (including getting into the month end calls with the business) & prioritizing the queue into critical/emails /statements and posting.-	Comparing the monthly numbers (actuals) with the budgets and also comparing with the last monthâs actuals and analyzing the reasons of variances.-	Was one point contact in the Accounts Payable process outsourcing to a third party vendor and was the key person to drive the entire outsourcing process.  -	Setting up KPIâs after providing feedback to the team and building KPI modules for measurement and reporting.-	Handling monthly video conference calls with stakeholders & the top management across the globe.-	Ensuring that employee morale is high and work is allocated to each individuals based on their skills and experiences.  -	Review of work executed by the team, which entails compliance with various applicable laws, Accounting Principles and Accounting Standards. -	Responsible to get the accounts audited as per the statutory requirement as per the Companies Act.  -	Responsible for getting the tax audit done for the Indian legal entities as per the requirement of Income Tax Act 1961.-	Responsible to get the accounts payable process audited by an independent firm relating to the control process.
experience.description_html:
Moving from audit background to an industy has been a different journey and a very different experience.

Core Areas of work responsibility at Integreon included:

- Managing the accurate monthly closure of financial reports of all legal entities including 3 processes (AP, PO and General Ledger) & team of 20 members and ensuring that MIS is prepared and reported to the management by the cut-off date.

- Handling the entire month end activities (including getting into the month end calls with the business) & prioritizing the queue into critical/emails /statements and posting.

- Comparing the monthly numbers (actuals) with the budgets and also comparing with the last monthâs actuals and analyzing the reasons of variances.

- Was one point contact in the Accounts Payable process outsourcing to a third party vendor and was the key person to drive the entire outsourcing process.
- Setting up KPIâs after providing feedback to the team and building KPI modules for measurement and reporting.

- Handling monthly video conference calls with stakeholders & the top management across the globe.

- Ensuring that employee morale is high and work is allocated to each individuals based on their skills and experiences.

- Review of work executed by the team, which entails compliance with various applicable laws, Accounting Principles and Accounting Standards.

- Responsible to get the accounts audited as per the statutory requirement as per the Companies Act.

- Responsible for getting the tax audit done for the Indian legal entities as per the requirement of Income Tax Act 1961.

- Responsible to get the accounts payable process audited by an independent firm relating to the control process.

projects.title: Master's Thesis - Study of Human Face Perception Using Abstract Art
projects.description: For my Master's thesis, I designed and brought to succession an ambitious project that not only explored a largely untouched area in neuroscience research but also sought to combine knowledge from the contrasting fields of fine arts and neurosciences to address the research question. This project pushed me to conduct extensive research in both fields and gave me the opportunity to understand the topic holistically. I scheduled the timeline of the project independently and thus, learnt to manage my time and schedule while working at a very fast pace. I also creatively collaborated with my research group through weekly meetings, which helped sharpen ideas and improve the output.Halfway through the project, I found that a large portion of my data would be unusable due to a coding error in the program we were using. I decided to use this as an opportunity to be creative - I looked into the research question to identify exactly what we were measuring and made alterations to fit the new model, and after conducting some statistical sanity checks, adjusted the project to the existing data without losing sight of the research question. This turned out to be a good idea and the project was a success. It is now being evaluated for inspiring further research at King's College London.

name: Saras Bjaj
about:
This quote from Barbara Tuchman, âHuman behaviour is timelessâ, perfectly articulates my interest and constant attempt at learning more about human behaviour. Hence I chose to be in a business that allows me to simulate human behaviour â Brand and Marketing Management.

This profession also comes from my view of the world, where I feel that in the coming years, the professional pursuits are drastically going to change. When today it is categorized as STEM and non-STEM majors, sooner we might see human experiences, behaviour analysis, and counselling, etc. becoming one of the largest professional majors in India as well.

Over the last 6 years, I have successfully managed design and delivery of brand communication across various marketing functions like Advertising, Digital & Social Marketing, Design Development, Brand Image Development, Market Research and Strategic Brand Management functions.

I enjoy working on finding, analysing, unearthing insights from seemingly irrational consumer behaviour, helping companies in conceptualizing and delivering marketing and branding strategies that drive loyalty, customer engagement, and brand awareness.

I also particularly enjoy working on extension of brand concepts across different cultures and geographies. The exposure to all types of management viz MNC, Family businesses, Start-ups, semi corporate with an understanding of different consumer buying behaviour like impulse, high involvement, premium & functional have been a highlight of my evolution in this brand management world.

In this journey, I have been proudly engaged with various industries like FMCG, Healthcare, Media & Entertainment, Manufacturing, Retail, etc., and exciting brands like Wagh Bakri, Lactalis India (Anik & Prabhat), HiCare, Mid-Day, IIM-U, Haldirams, Shott, LP Industries to name the big ones.

My motivation comes from learning and doing new things, like taking a course on Cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT) to understand the roots of thinking behaviour, or following my school time passion for classical music, or a desire to start something, like I did start an advertising knowledge sharing page on Instagram by the name âAds â Made in Indiaâ which needs to swing in action again.

I believe that my passion, motivation, learning attitude, flexible mindset, ability to un-learn, re-learn and thrive in a fast-moving environment, and most importantly experimenting attitude is something that allows me to fit into your work environment as this sets me apart.

name: Ashish Gandhi
about:
As a director at Ernst & Young (E&Y), I lead a team of Chartered Accountants and Lawyers working as a tax professionals, providing comprehensive tax advisory services and are passionate about delivering high-quality service and building long-term relationships with our clients.

In my overall 15 years of experience in Indirect tax consulting, I have successfully advised clients on GST transition, various indirect tax compliances, tax structuring across various sectors including Pharmaceuticals, Chemicals, Consumer and Retail.

I have developed and implemented recommended solutions for impending tax policy changes adhering to GST regulations namely, DigiGST (end to end GST compliance management tool), Global Trade (Custom automation), Global e-invoicing.

Key specializations - tax advisory, compliance management, tax process automation, tax litigation, tax audits, tax planning, and due diligence matters, Govt Incentive advisory.

name: ABHAY KUMAR JAIN Indore / Mumbai
about:
I embarked on a journey into training and education since 1999. As an educationist, I have a strong will to change the system, give room to new thoughts and make the substantial contribution towards the society by creating qualified professionals.

A Computer Engineer by qualification and hailing from a humble background, the path as an entrepreneur wasnât easy. I believe that an achiever in the World is the product of motivation, which is born out of the struggle to fulfill any desire. The zeal and undying passion gave that birth to this unique initiative in the nation by the name "Virtual Voyage" College of Media,Design & Management.

I give the credit to my students of initial years for developing me to this stature. The strong connect with the students, ability to understand their apprehension and the vision to generate bright employment opportunities gave me courage & allowed to expand self-horizon and create opportunities for many.

With a Hindi medium schooling background, I faced a tough time dealing with Engineering and Computer books. I had spent a valuable time in learning English. The thought was to overcome the language barrier and complete the degree successfully. That was the phase when the seeds of entrepreneurship were sown. I started with my first English-speaking classes âAmbienceâ with an aim to help students to overcome with their fear of speaking English.

Virtual Voyage is an institution that serves as a platform for students to enhance the overall educational experience of young minds through a range of extracurricular programs, facilities, services and activities. It has emerged as countryâs most unique and biggest training academy. The campus offers 30 handpicked courses and it not only breaks the conventional opinions of parents, peer and educational counsellors, but has also excelled well in positioning the so-called secondary career courses as mainstream options.

name: Rahul Dalal
about:
The four things I am passionate about are Everton Football Club, test match cricket, mountaineering and steam locomotives. Following my graduation, my first job was as a Transportation Engineer for the Mumbai Metropolitan Region Development Authority where I was able to pursue my passion for trains by working on the Mumbai Metro and especially the planning of the fully underground 33km Metro Line 3.

At StudioPOD, I have been able to continue working on metro rail projects in Mumbai, Bangalore, and Delhi as well as other transportation projects including street designs and multi-modal integration plans. Recently I have also started studying and developing innovative and sustainable financing strategies for the various transportation, and master planning projects the office is working on.

An unfortunate lack of sporting talent has resulted in me not being successful in following my sporting passions. As an amateur sportsman, on weekends you will find me either on the football pitch or maidans clumsily trying to emulate the exploits of his sporting heroes.

name: Krishna Naik
about:
From a young age, I have always been excited by numbers. I was top of the class in book keeping and accountancy at my Higher Secondary School. When I finished my Higher Secondary School I enrolled for Chartered Accountancy course at Institute of Chartered Accountants Of India, Mumbai.

Today, I am Chartered Accountant with more than 10 years of diverse experience in the field of accountancy, finance, funding, direct taxation and indirect taxation. I still love getting to grips with numbers and complex data to solve problems and support business success.

In my current role, I prepare financial reports and statements while managing a range of finance-related tasks. I also analyse financial information to enable informed decision-making at Senior Management level. My current role also showcases my expertise in streamlining processes, minimizing risk, and improving compliance with regulations/deadlines. For this, I have been awarded as "APAC Finance Rockstar" within 7 months of joining the organisation. Furthermore, I embrace the challenges that come with research management.

As a solutions-focused professional who recognizes the interdependence of people, processes, technology, and organisational culture in successful management, I undoubtedly possess the people skills and drive necessary to function as an organisational leader.

Specialities: Finance management, accountancy, financial and tax consultancy, financial reporting, regulatory compliances, Goods and Service Tax, Initial Public Offer (IPO) funding, Direct taxation, Working capital management.

name: Vishal Lodha
about:
I am the Managing Director for ENRX India (formerly known as EFD Induction India), responsible for the entire business in this region. We supply high-end machines to the Indian, South Asian and South American market as our main focus. We also provide high quality components and parts to customers and Group companies in Europe, USA and China. I strongly believe in trust, integrity and transparency as important pillars for growth and cooperation.
Prior to joining ENRX (or EFD Induction India), I worked in the consulting domain with KPMG and EY, in their Risk Consulting divisions.
I have about 15 years of professional experience and have delivered on projects across multiple countries and worked in various sectors such as Manufacturing, Healthcare, Oil and Gas, Information technology, Automobile, Financial services, Education, Metals trading industry etc.
I am a Chartered Accountant (from ICAI, India), Certified Fraud Examiner (from ACFE, USA) and a Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA qualified from ISACA, USA). In addition, I have completed my Bachelor of Commerce from Bangalore University and pursued the International Baccalaureate Diploma from International Baccalaureate Organization, Switzerland.

name: Rakesh Lahoti
about:
Rakesh Lahoti is a seasoned Chartered Accountant and the Director of Raru Capital IFSC Private Limited. With an extensive career spanning over two decades, he has honed an unparalleled understanding of the complex financial landscape. Beyond his professional qualifications, Rakesh is a visionary in the field of digital commerce, having successfully completed a diploma program at the prestigious Nirma Institution in Ahmedabad. Notably, he demonstrated remarkable foresight by anticipating the Dot Com bubble before its dramatic burst.

Driven by passion and an unyielding ambition, Rakesh has navigated through significant financial events, including the rise and fall of Harshad Mehta, the infamous KP scam, political milestones, the tumultuous saga of ILFs, and the market-shaking tremors of the COVID-19 pandemic. His journey is a testament to his profound insight, resilience, and unwavering commitment to making a lasting impact on the landscape of success.

name: Manish Sharda
about:
I am an achievement-oriented Chartered Accountant with over 2 decades of rich & extensive experience in Strategic Financial Planning & Control, Stakeholder Engagement, Budgeting & Forecasting and People Management. I am an accomplished professional delivering year-on-year success in managing the entire gamut of Finance Operations with consistent record of delivering results in growth, revenue, cost, operational performance & profitability.
My dexterity lies in reviewing & enhancing all financial procedures and internal controls, automating & integrating financial information systems, preparing financial forecasts with coordinated budget projections, and developing a plan to smoothen process for capital flow management. Demonstrated excellence in validation & variance analysis of quarterly & annual financial statement of all zones, liaising with Auditors, CFD and Zones to resolve queries from CFD/Pending observations of auditors unresolved at zones for Quarterly/annual financial statements.
Over the time, I have proved my excellence in leading end-to-end financial reporting operations, finalization of financial statements in discussion with Head of Finance and providing sign-off on numbers. Track record in managing teams in setting inspirational goals, defined KPIs & metrics for the team and ensured achievement of the goals while collaborating with top management team in decision-making process. Have Good knowledge of SAP / People Soft /Oracle Financials /ERP and excel.
Excellently delivered insight on financial decision-making process through analysis, financial projections (planning, budgeting and forecasting) and reporting; brought in scalable financial control in operations
Conferred with Idea Cellular Ltd. Excellence Award for successfully closing the audit of accounts FY 2008-2009 for Mumbai circle

A seasoned entrepreneur and investor with a track record across diverse sectors, he is renowned for his pragmatic and intuitive approach. Prior to co-founding Equitree in 2012, Ssuneet served as an in-house advisor to small and mid-sized businesses, providing expertise in financial and tax matters.
